comment.caption: Louis W. Truman Smokes the "Peace Pipe" with Oscar Billy
comment.note: Major General Louis W. Truman (right) smokes a "peace pipe" with Yakima Chief Oscar Billy. Yakima Indians named Truman an honorary chief of the tribe with the title "Ne-Chee-Wa-Kiswit," meaning "great hope of life" during their traditional pow-wow at White Swan, Washington.
